text: Juna manisa aphno gharabara chadi allahako batoma lagcha usale dhartima saranako nimti prasasta tha'um ra jivika pani pa'une cha ra juna manisa aphno ghara chadi allaha ra tyasako rasulako margama lagnecha, yadi usako mrtyu pravasama huncha bhane tyasako puraskara pani allaha che'u niscita bha'ihalyo ra allaha bado ksama pradana garnevala dayalu cha
